description: Defines standard validation steps to be executed before committing or pushing code generated/modified during high-risk bootstrap batches.

pre_commit.description: Check for style guide adherence and potential errors (requires linters like flake8/pylint to be installed).

pre_push.description: Run the standard functional surface validation against the component.
Execute component-specific unit tests if available (requires test framework and tests).

notes: This is a draft policy and requires refinement.
Specific tools (linters, test frameworks) need to be installed in the environment.
The execution plan batches should reference steps from this policy.
